text: @realDonaldTrump We need to social distance due to the high level of asymptomatic people, that it can kill young healthy adults, and that they just discovered COVID-19 alive for 19 days on the surfaces of the cruise ships it originated from in America contradicting the previous study.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
